rules.ruleString: For COURSE_CODE IN {1901} Do true Otherwise Must be enrolled in course owned by {50000564}
For COURSE_CODE IN {1901, 4201} Do true Otherwise Permission required
Any co-req (I/W) unit in {EDF5806, EDF5807, EDF5808, EDF5809}

description: This unit provides the means for managing the professional experience placements within the Master of Teaching (Secondary) course. This is the sixth of six professional experience units.
